text: "Shape I'm In" is a 1979 song by Australian band Jo Jo Zep & The Falcons. It is the second single from their fourth studio album Screaming Targets. It went to number 22 in Australia and number 41 in New Zealand. == Track listing == 7" (K 7665) *Side A1 "Shape I'm In" - 3:32 *Side B1 "So Young" (new version) \- 3:31 *Side B2 "Shape I'm In" (Dub Version) \- 3:01 7" (UK) (WEA â€“ K 79122) *Side A1 "Shape I'm In" - 3:32 *Side B1 "Only The Lonely Heart" *Side B1 "Nosey Parker" == References == Category:1979 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Reggae songs Category:Jo Jo Zep & The Falcons songs
title: Shape I'm In (Jo Jo Zep & The Falcons song)
